channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: NFL Week 8 Team of the Week: Running Backs Star; Jordan Love Wows on Sunday Night
item.description: Running backs thrived in Week 8, while the quarterback spot was filled by the starter on the best team in the NFC. You could go with any of this week's four-touchdown gang â€“ Miami's Tua Tagovailoa, Philadelphia's Jalen Hurts or Denver's Bo Nix but Love was so efficient in how he out-dueled Aaron Rodgers in prime time, we have to look his way.
